item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
u mean like this one ?

Kvm + whonix 11 slowness KVM
hi there , im using debian jessie with kvm + whonix 11. before when i was using the kvm it was on my old laptop and i thought the slowness from the laptop itself. now i have shifted my work on my new laptop to work on debian and i have installed kvm + whonix 11, but the suprising i have got the same thing. the whonix is very slow and freeze for few seconds and work again with slow performance and so on ... i thought the cause is might be i should increase the ram and the processor so i have incr…

if so, then the solution is this:-

QXL Slowness Fix KVM
sudo nano /usr/share/X11/xorg.conf.d/50-qxl.conf Section "Device" Identifier "qxl" Driver "qxl" Option "ENABLE_SURFACES" "False" EndSection And reboot http://lists.freedesktop.org/archives/spice-devel/2012-November/011479.html
